wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Walter Kelsey (1926 – 18 March 1995) was a Scottish bridge player and writer, best known for advanced books on the play of the cards.

response: Or declarer might be in an unusually good contract. Hugh KelseyKelsey, H.W. Match-Point Bridge. Faber, 1970. gives this example:
* Hugh Kelsey, Kelsey on Squeeze Play (Master Bridge)
